## StoredFunction class

StoredFunction is used with OpenRestDB to call a stored function

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare class StoredFunction extends StoredProcedure 
```
**Extends:** [StoredProcedure](./forms42core.storedprocedure.md)

|  --- | --- | --- |

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [getReturnValue()](./forms42core.storedfunction.getreturnvalue.md) |  | Get the name of returned parameter from the function call |
